techStacksContent: From designing websites to developing webapps, from writing programs in C++ to writing scripts in Python, I do everything. More specifically, I work on writing robust backend structures and creating beautiful UI's. I also have some knowledge about the Linux kernel, working on Cloud and Machine Learning.
responsibilityContent: I am a great team player. From a Website designer writing code in HTML, to being a mobile app developer designing Flutter apps, to writing robust backend structure's in Django, I have been responsible for handling work in a lot of different teams.

positions.title: Web Designer
positions.name: Web Designer at Converge Clan
positions.aboutPosition: Converge Clan is the computer club of Montfort School, Ashok Vihar. It is a group of talented and curious technology enthusiasts who are specialised in different fields of technology, namely quizzing, programming, web development, digital imaging, 3D Modeling, video editting and group discussion. My primary role involved designing and maintaining it's websites.

positions.institute: Entrepreneurship Development Cell, Bharati Vidyapeeth Pune
positions.title: Web Designer
positions.name: Web Designer at Entrepreneurship Development Cell, Bharati Vidyapeeth Pune
positions.aboutPosition: Entrepreneurship Development Cell, is basically for the students and by the students. I was one of 6 students selected over 250 students for the role of a website designer. My primary role was to design website for upcoming events. I also worked on automating processes like sending personalised emails over SMTP.

positions.title: Volunteer
positions.name: Volunteer at Google Developers Group, Pune
positions.aboutPosition: Google Developers Group Pune is an initiative to concentrate the efforts of many developers in and around Pune to learn, share and get productive using the various Google products. I volunteered at several events like Devfest Pune 2018.

positions.institute: Developer Student Clubs, Bharati Vidyapeeth Pune
positions.title: Core Team Member
positions.name: Core Team Member at Developer Student Clubs, Bharati Vidyapeeth Pune
positions.aboutPosition: We at Developer Student Clubs aim to learn and teach. Developers, designers and managers come together under one roof to create a community which inspires thousands. My primary role includes taking workshops and organising events. I have successfully conducted workshops on Getting Started with Flutter, Automation with Python and Open Source 101.

positions.institute: School of Information Technology, Indian Institute of Technology Delhi
positions.title: Intern
positions.name: Intern at School of Information Technology, Indian Institute of Technology Delhi
positions.aboutPosition: I was an intern under Prof. Smruti Ranjan Sarangi for a period of two months. I worked on a project to create a system to track files in real time using barcodes and barcode scanners. We made a central web app based on Java and Struts. It was deployed on a VM instance on IIT Delhi’s ingenious cloud platform making it accessible locally, within the IIT network. Also, IIT Delhi’s OAuth system was added to increase the security of the app and make it accessible to everyone within the IIT network.

positions.title: Web Designer
positions.name: Web Designer at Google Developers Group, Pune
positions.aboutPosition: Google Developers Group Pune is an initiative to concentrate the efforts of many developers in and around Pune to learn, share and get productive using the various Google products. As a web designer, my primary role inludes maintaining and updating the website from time to time. The website I made attracted more than 4,000 views in a period of about a week.

contactContent: I love collaborating with people. Feel like we can create something schwag worthy? Just hit me up on any of your favorite communications platform.
